title: Gratulerer med dagen - special video message from Dag
description: 17th May is celebrated as National Day across Norway, and the phrase 'gratulerer med dagen' (literally, 'congratulations on the day') is heard hundreds of times. This video special, filmed in Norway today, features teacher Dag wishing all the OML Norwegian listeners a happy National Day.
content:encoded: 17th May is celebrated as National Day across Norway, and the phrase 'gratulerer med dagen' (literally, 'congratulations on the day') is heard hundreds of times. This video special, filmed in Norway today, features teacher Dag wishing all the OML Norwegian listeners a happy National Day.
itunes:subtitle: Our Norwegian teacher Dag shares a special National Day message
